dungeoncrawler.gameobject.creature

Class Creature

  • java.lang.Object
    • dungeoncrawler.gameobject.GameObject
      • dungeoncrawler.gameobject.creature.Creature
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NPC, Player

    public abstract class Creature
extends GameObject
    This abstract class contains all information that is common to all creatures within the world, including the player and monsters. All monsters have the following attributes:

    - Max health
    - Current health
    - Damage

    Additionally, to avoid having to compare class type, a player-type Creature will have isPlayer boolean set to true, others should be false.

      • takeDamage

        public void takeDamage(int damage)
        Causes damage to the creature. Reduces an amount of health equal to the damage parameter. Health cannot be reduced below 0.
        The logic for removing dead creatures from the game map is not implemented in this class and should be handled by game logic handling classes.
        Parameters:
        damage - the amount of damage to be done to the creature

      • setCurrentHealth
